parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Time </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set time acceleration coefficient. May be also used to slow time in cutscenes. This command does NOT work in multiplayer. accFactor is clamped to [1/128; 4]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''setAccTime''' accFactor

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> accFactor: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>setAccTime 0.1</inner><close></pre></close></ext> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[accTime]], [[setTimeMultiplier]], [[timeMultiplier]], [[useAudioTimeForMoves]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on August 4, 2006 - 10:58
<dt class="note">[[User:Hardrock|hardrock]]<dd class="note">''Notes from before the conversion:''

A good habit to get into is setting the [[accTime]] to 1 at the start of all cutscenes, in case the [[player]] is running at 4x speed when the scene starts.


<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
